summary: A comprehensive collection of pytest modules that verify the functionality of AWS API Gateway operations—including creation, configuration, deployment, integration, authorizers, domain names, usage plans, stages, validators, VPC links, import/export, and CloudFormation templates—by exercising boto3 calls against Moto’s mock AWS environment.
business_intent: To provide automated regression testing that guarantees correct implementation and handling of API Gateway resources within the application, ensuring reliability, compliance with specifications, and early detection of integration issues.
